How it works

A simple, guided flow for your visitors.

The chatbot keeps replies short, asks up to five questions, then collects contact details and confirms the plan.

1

Visitor starts chat

Floating widget greets them and asks simple questions one at a time.

2

AI understands needs

Short, friendly replies‚Äîno jargon. It checks for business type, goals, and key details.

3

Lead details collected

Name, email, and optional phone are requested only after context is clear.

4

You get an email

Conversation summary and contact info are sent to your inbox automatically.
